text: The #Covid19 #vaccine has renewed interest in & fear of vaccinations. The VACCINE project will create a digital game to explain the science behind vaccinations, infections & the immune system #H2020 @EU_H2020 #Openscience #RRI #gaming #swafs @BabrahamInst https://t.co/AOGUZlFA3t https://t.co/jIPrkTMiNE
